Translations.Text: ivella naija vrttantagalagive. Allahana horatu pujar'haru beraru illa. Allahanu khandita atyanta prabalanu yuktivantanu agiddane
Istagiyu avaru (satyavannu) kadeganisuttarendadare (avarige tilidirali) allahanu gondala habbuvavarannu cennagi ballanu

‘‘granthadavare, nam'ma mattu nim'ma naduve samanavagiruva ansadedege banniri. Navu allahana horatu berarannu pujisadirona mattu yarannu avana jote palugolisadirona. Hageye nam'malli yaru allahana horatu bere yarannu devarugalagisabaradu’’ endu heliri. Istagiyu avaru hathamaritanavanne toridare, ‘‘nivu saksigalagiri, navantu khandita muslimaragiruvevu (allahanige saranagiruvevu)’’ endu ghosisiri
(mattu heliri:) ‘‘Granthadavare, niveke nam'modane ibrahim‌ra kuritu jagaladuttiri? Taurat mattu injil‌galannu avara anantaravaste ilisalagittu. Nivu alocisuvudillave?’’
‘‘Nimage alpasvalpa tilidiruva visayagalallantu nivu sakastu jagaladiddayitu. (Idiga) nimage enenu tilidillada visayadalli nivu jagaladuvudeke? Ballavanu allahanu matra, nivu ballavaralla
ibrahimaru yahudiyagali kraistanagali agiralilla. Avaru nisthavanta muslimaragiddaru. Avaru khandita bahudevaradhakaragiralilla
janara paiki ibrahimarondige nijavada nantiruvudu, avarannu anusarisuvavarige – (andare) i devadutarige mattu visvasigalige matra. Allahane visvasigala posakanagiddane
granthadavarallina ondu pangadavu, hegadaru nim'mannu dari tappisalu hambalisuttide. Nijavagi avaru svatah tam'manne darigedisuttiddaraste. Adare avarige adara arivilla
granthadavare, allahana vacanagalige (avu satyavembudakke) nive saksigalagiruvaga niveke avugalannu dhikkarisuttiruviri
